Package edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.optimize

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Optimization
    Perform peephole optimization on the list of instructions starting with the instruction at the specified position in the list and looking at that instruction plus the next several instructions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BranchingReduction
    Improves branching instructions where a nonconditional branch is used to branch over a conditional branch (which can occur when an exit statement appears at the end of a loop).
    ConstFolding
    Replaces runtime arithmetic on constants with compile-time arithmetic.
    ConstNeg
    Performs a special type of constant folding by replacing an instruction sequence of the form LDCINT x, NEG with LDCINT -x.
    IncDec
    Replaces addition of 1 with increment and subtraction of 1 with decrement.
    IncDec2
    Replaces addition of 1 to a variable with increment and subtraction of 1 from a variable with decrement.
    LoadSpecialConstants
    Replaces LDCB 0 with LDCB0, LDCB 1 with LDCB1, LDCINT 0 with LDCINT0, and LDCINT 1 with LDCINT1.
    Optimizations
    This class is used to retrieve the list of all optimizations.
    OptimizationUtil
    Utility class for shift-related optimizations.
    ShiftLeft
    Replaces multiplication by a power of 2 times a variable with left shift.
    ShiftLeftRight
    Replaces multiplication by a power of 2 with left shift and division by a power of two with right shift where possible.
